snippet: Memory chipmaker SanDisk said on Wednesday its fourth-quarter profit and revenue exceeded expectations as the adoption of solid-state drives helped boost demand for its chips....

headline.print_headline: Memory Chipmaker SanDisk's Fourth-Quarter Profit, Revenue Beat Street
headline.main: Memory Chipmaker SanDisk's Fourth-Quarter Profit, Revenue Beat Street

lead_paragraph: Memory chipmaker SanDisk said on Wednesday its fourth-quarter profit and revenue exceeded expectations as the adoption of solid-state drives helped boost demand for its chips.
